thread.title: 2016 CHAN qualifier: William Agbovi heads Ghanaian referees to handle DR Congo-Central Africa Republic clash
thread.title_full: 2016 CHAN qualifier: William Agbovi heads Ghanaian referees to handle DR Congo-Central Africa Republic clash

title: 2016 CHAN qualifier: William Agbovi heads Ghanaian referees to handle DR Congo-Central Africa Republic clash
text:
19:40 CET 2016 CHAN qualifier: William Agbovi heads Ghanaian referees to handle DR Congo-Central Africa Republic clash - www.ghanasoccernet.com William Abgovi 
CAF has appointed referee William Agbovi to officiate this month's Championship of African Nations qualifier match between DR Congo and the Central Africa Republic. 
Countrymen Dawood Brimah Yamdogo Ouedrago and David Agyin will assist him on the lines. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
